summary: This test module validates the custom exception and warning mechanisms of the particle library by deliberately providing invalid element, isotope, charge, and particle specifications and asserting that the appropriate exception types and messages are raised, ensuring correct error handling throughout the package.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and reliability of the particle API by systematically testing its error‑handling pathways, so developers and users receive clear, standards‑compliant feedback when supplying improper particle identifiers or parameters.
